text.autoconfig.imbleeding.title: Haemorrhage Config
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.enable: Player will get darkness after taking damage at low HP
Player will get blindness at 1 hp
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.fireDa: Fire damage lowers duration of bleeding
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.enable: Melee attacks upgrade bleeding (or health loss, when attacked by spider)
While having Bleeding I, there is a chance that player will get Bleeding II after getting damage from melee attack
While having Bleeding I, there is a chance that player will get Bleeding II after getting damage from arrow
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.meleeB: Length of bleeding from melee attacks
20 = 1s. This value is multiplied by damage taken
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.arrowB: 20 = 1s. This value is multiplied by damage taken
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.health: Length of health loss from spider attacks
20 = 1s. This value is multiplied by damage taken
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.bleedo: 20 = 1s. This value is divided by 2 the first time player gets Bleedout. Doesn't affect how quickly player dies from Bleedout
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.chance: Chance to lower bleeding amplifier with fire (%)
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.baseCh: Base chance to upgrade bleeding or health loss (%)
This chance is multiplied by damage taken. Base chance for getting Bleeding (or Health Loss) III is: thisValue/10 + 1
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.bleedi: Frequency of dealing damage by bleeding
20 = 1s. The higher this value, the more time it takes to bleed out
